pkgmetadata.longdescription: # prettydiff**prettydiff** - diff parsed JSON objects and pretty-print it> `$ python3 -m pip install prettydiff`- [Custom output format example (HTML)](https://github.com/python273/prettydiff/blob/master/example_html.py)## terminal```pythonfrom prettydiff import print_diffa = {"a": "hello", "b": True, "c": [1, 3], "d": {"e": {"f": 1}}}b = {"a": "world", "b": False, "c": [1, 2, 3]}# to enable colors: $ python3 -m pip install prettydiff[terminal]print_diff(a, b)``````diff {- 'a': 'hello',+ 'a': 'world',- 'b': True,+ 'b': False, 'c': [ 1,- 3,+ 2,+ 3, ],- 'd': {- 'e': {- 'f': 1,- },- }, }```
